page.title: 03Blanket making in Witney.
page.content:
The first record of cloth making in Witney was in 1179 when a Witney weaver was fined 6s.8d.
Blanket making in Early's of Witney began in 1669 and the firm changed its name to Charles Early and Marriot, but is now just Early's of Witney. Early's of Witney has been at the centre of Blanket making in Witney for over 300 years and is now the only surviving blanket making factory in Witney. Early's of Witney takes up part of Mill Street. The chairman of Earlys of Witney is N.S.Wooding.
